The game gives you a medal for playing for 5 and 10 years. I have the 5 one. There is a reason why I keep coming back, and that is to get out of silver. Maybe ill do it before I get the 10 year medal.

Pros- This very new and fresh indie game is not very well known, but turns out it is pretty good. Wow, this should like win awards or something. 
Cons- Has no crafting system or ability to build your own house, wtf
If you want to have a social life and be able to get your stuff done without going crazy to play, don't play this. Its addicting.
